name: Finding Harmony
description:
Submisson to Health Gamejam 2021: http://games-ahead.de/health-game-jam/

Controls: WASD, Mouse, E or F to interact, Space / Shift to jump, Escape for Settings

Description:
A therapeutic game that tries to create a safe space for those struggling with trauma or anxiety.  Explore the open world environment and find your spirit companions. Each companion has its own melody, once you collect all companions you will hear complete full background Soundtrack.
